channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
I just noticed recently that my handcannon has the attack styles chop slash etc. how do i fix this? And i have NOTHING at my dragon claws, only just the signs of attack like this http://prntscr.com/14q4vm
base : PI

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The special isn’t added that way, it’s added somewhere else.
Oh, and for some reason in my code for the hand cannon, a line is commented out, un-comment it.

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:519195”][quote author=xXSh0ckXx link=topic=637653.msg4297974#msg4297974 date=1368542667]
And how do i fix it with the claws?
[/quote]
Really… I mean come on, there’s nothing in that file that could have told you how?[/quote]

[quote=“Sup22211, post:4, topic:519195”]else if(WeaponName.contains(“claws”) || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == clawsID){
setSidebarInterface(0, 7762);
sendFrame246(7763, 200, Weapon);
}
;)[/quote]
Rofl i know i figured it out, but i needed the Frame + Sidebarinterface + Thank you Sup I love you for that <3

EDIT : Everything is messed up lol, Handcannon does not show spec + The name is -2 and from claws the name got deleted it just shows me my combat level and the spec. attack (everything is the same, but the name got deleted)

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In ItemAssistant.java findt:

public void sendWeapon(int Weapon, String WeaponName) {

after one of the else if’s, add:

 else if (WeaponName.endsWith("cannon") || WeaponName.startsWith("hand") || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == HANDCANNONID ) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); //accurate, rapid, longrange
			c.getPA().sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon);
			// c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);
		}

Or, I mean, you could see if the hand cannon is added in there and change it.

Read full topic
